thread.title: Who will Sam Frost choose in The Bachelorette grand final?
thread.title_full: Who will Sam Frost choose in The Bachelorette grand final?

title: Who will Sam Frost choose in The Bachelorette grand final?
text:
Who will Sam Frost choose in The Bachelorette grand final? Seanna Cronin | 22nd Oct 2015 6:00 AM Seanna Cronin APN Entertainment Editor A US ex-pat, Seanna has been writing about the Australian entertainment industries for the past six years and is also a documentary producer, photographer and scuba diver. Sam Frost stars in the TV series The Bachelorette. Channel 10 Local Real Estate Cars For Sale 
SAM Frost is head over heels for her new beau and tonight viewers will finally see which man has stolen her heart. 
Tonight's grand final of the hit reality dating show will see the 26-year-old choose between her final two suitors: construction manager Sasha Mielczarek and real estate agent and soccer player Michael Turnbull. 
Last night's episode saw Frost farewell Perth rope technician Richie Strahan, a favourite amongst many viewers for his sense of humour. 
It looks to be a close race with fans tipping Mielczarek by a small margin on the show's love leaderboard. Reader poll Who will win The Bachelorette? This poll ended on 22 October 2015. 
Sasha - 48% 
Michael - 41% 
I don't care - 9% This is not a scientific poll. The results reflect only the opinions of those who chose to participate. 
Frost will introduce the two men to her family tonight and has already met their families during last week's home visits. 
Frost has been very open with media about her happiness with the man she chooses, confirming they are still together four months after the finale was filmed in New Zealand. 
The show has seen the Melbourne beauty bounce back from her Bachelor heartbreak following her very public split with Blake Garvey last year. 
A social media campaign is already gaining traction for last night's eliminee Richie Strahan to be next year's Bachelor. 
The Bachelorette grand final airs tonight at 7.30pm on Channel 10. bachelorette
